data.title: Welcome to Lynn University
data.meta_description: Lynn University is a private Florida college located in Boca Raton that offers a broad range of degrees for undergraduate and graduate students.
data.text:
I chose Lynn for the location, class size, schedule, and overall learning environment. Outside of class, I spend a lot of time outdoors! I love to find new trails, go to the beach, or go jet-skiing! After Lynn, I hope to have built meaningful connections and made a lot of memories!

Kathleen Scott '24

Boca Raton, Florida, Psychology

[email protected]

Music has been a huge part of my life since I was little, so finding a good conservatory was essential for me. The conservatory and faculty here at Lynn are amazing and are really helping me prepare for a career in music! Outside of the classroom, I enjoy swimming, drawing, and reading! After Lynn, I hope to pursue my master's degree and work towards getting a job in an orchestra!

Olivia Oakland '25

Boca Raton, Florida, Performance: Strings, Woodwinds, Brass, Harp & Percussion

[email protected]

I chose Lynn because its close to home and the classes are small. Outside of class, I like hanging out with friends, going to see any new marvel movie, or just playing video games. After getting my bachelor's in biology, I plan on to continue my education by applying to vet schools.

Brian Manzanares '24

Coral Springs, Florida, Biology

[email protected]
